mapper.update: INSERT INTO tb_user (user_id, user_pwd, emp_no, user_nm, dept_cd , rank_cd, duty_cd, cphone_num1, cphone_num2, cphone_num3 , phone_num1, phone_num2, phone_num3, email_id, email_domain , hiredate, created_by) VALUES(#{A}, #{B}, #{C}, #{D}, #{E}, #{F}, #{G}, #{H}, #{I}, #{J}, #{K}, #{L}, #{M}, #{N}, #{O}, #{P}, #{Q})
INSERT INTO TB_AUTH (auth_id, auth_nm, active_flg, del_flg) VALUES(#{A}, #{B}, #{C}, #{D})
